LanguageData.SMU.CheckAllTT: Instead of only checking enabled mods, also disabled mods will be checked. This may increase the time it takes to process if subscribed to a lot of mods.
LanguageData.SMU.SteamMod: Mod is loaded from the Steam mod-folder
LanguageData.SMU.LocalMod: Mod is loaded from the local mod-folder
LanguageData.SMU.LogSave: No previous save found, cannot show mod-updates.
LanguageData.SMU.LogMessage: Found {0} mod-updates since save was made at {1}
LanguageData.SMU.LogMessageNone: Found no mod-updates since save was made at {0}
LanguageData.SMU.OrderByDateTT: Will order the update list by when each mod updated instead of in alphabetical order
LanguageData.SMU.CheckOnlineTT: Will connect to steam to get the updated description and the exact date the mod was updated
